languages.text: {n}Помедлив, техножрец продолжает:{/n} "У великих машин Империума — таких, как твой корабль — машинный дух столь сложен и своеволен, что его сложно отличить от Изуверского Интеллекта. Я не исключаю, что Номос могут быть сущностью скверны. Но с каждым днем во мне крепнет вера, что это не так, и что на деле мы видим чудо Омниссии. Пятой категории, не меньше".

traits.locale_text: {n}Помедлив, техножрец продолжает:{/n} "У великих машин Империума — таких, как твой корабль — машинный дух столь сложен и своеволен, что его сложно отличить от Изуверского Интеллекта. Я не исключаю, что Номос может быть сущностью скверны. Но с каждым днем во мне крепнет вера, что это не так, и что на деле мы видим чудо Омниссии. Пятой категории, не меньше".

languages.text: {n}After a pause, Pasqal continues,{/n} "Great machines of the Imperium, ones such as your ship, house a machine spirit so complex and wilful that it is difficult to tell them apart from Abominable Intelligence. There remains a possibility that Nomos is an entity of corruption. But with every day, I grow stronger in my faith that it is not so, that what we are witnessing is, in truth, the Omnissiah's miracle. One that is Category Five or higher."
languages.original_text: {n}Помедлив, техножрец продолжает:{/n} "У великих машин Империума — таких, как твой корабль — машинный дух столь сложен и своеволен, что его сложно отличить от Изуверского Интеллекта. Я не исключаю, что Номос могут быть сущностью скверны. Но с каждым днем во мне крепнет вера, что это не так, и что на деле мы видим чудо Омниссии. Пятой категории, не меньше".

There remains a possibility that Nomos is an entity of corruption. But with every day, I grow stronger in my faith that it is not so, that what we are witnessing is, in truth, the Omnissiah's miracle. One that is category five or higher."

But with every day, I grow stronger in my faith that it is not so, that what we are witnessing is, in truth, the Omnissiah's miracle. One that is category five or higher."

There remains a possibility that Nomos is an entity of corruption. But with every day, I grow stronger in my faith that it is not so, that what we are witnessing is, in truth, the Omnissiah's miracle. One that is Category Five or higher."

languages.text: {n}Après s'être interrompu, Pasqal reprend : {/n} « Les grandes machines de l'Imperium, telles que votre vaisseau, ont un esprit de la machine si complexe et volontaire qu'il est difficile de les distinguer de l'Intelligence Abominable. Reste la possibilité que Nomos soit une entité de corruption, mais je suis de plus en plus convaincu que ce n'est pas le cas et que ce à quoi nous assistons est bel et bien un miracle de l'Omnimessie. Un miracle de catégorie cinq... au bas mot ! »
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, Pasqal continues,{/n} "Great machines of the Imperium, ones such as your ship, house a machine spirit so complex and wilful that it is difficult to tell them apart from Abominable Intelligence. There remains a possibility that Nomos is an entity of corruption. But with every day, I grow stronger in my faith that it is not so, that what we are witnessing is, in truth, the Omnissiah's miracle. One that is Category Five or higher."

traits.locale_text: {n}Après s'être interrompu, Pasqal reprend : {/n} « Les grandes machines de l'Imperium, telles que votre vaisseau, ont un esprit mécanique si complexe et volontaire qu'il est difficile de les distinguer de l'Intelligence Abominable. Reste la possibilité que Nomos soit une entité de corruption, mais je suis de plus en plus convaincu que ce n'est pas le cas et que ce à quoi nous assistons est bel et bien un miracle de l'Omnimessie. Un miracle de catégorie cinq... au bas mot ! »

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡短暂停顿一会儿之后，继续说道。{/n}“帝国的伟大机器，比如你的飞船，里面的机魂往往非常复杂、任性，很难将它们与邪恶的智能区分开来。诺莫斯确实有可能是个腐化的实体，但随着时间推移，我越发坚信事实并非如此。我们现在所见证的，实际上是欧姆尼塞亚的奇迹，这样的奇迹可以划分至第五级，甚至更高级别。”
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, Pasqal continues,{/n} "Great machines of the Imperium, ones such as your ship, house a machine spirit so complex and wilful that it is difficult to tell them apart from Abominable Intelligence. There remains a possibility that Nomos is an entity of corruption. But with every day, I grow stronger in my faith that it is not so, that what we are witnessing is, in truth, the Omnissiah's miracle. One that is Category Five or higher."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡短暂停顿一会儿之后，继续说道。{/n}“帝国的伟大机器，比如你的飞船，里面的机魂往往非常复杂、任性，很难将它们与邪恶的智能区分开来。诺莫斯确实有可能是个腐化的实体，但随着时间推移，我越发坚信事实并非如此。我们现在所见证的，实际上是欧姆尼塞亚的奇迹，这样的奇迹可以划分至第五级，甚至更高级别。”

languages.text: {n}Nach einer Pause fährt Pasqal fort:{/n} "Große Maschinen des Imperiums, beispielsweise Euer Schiff, beherbergen einen so komplexen und willensstarken Maschinengeist, dass es schwierig ist, sie von Abscheulicher Intelligenz zu unterscheiden. Es besteht noch immer die Möglichkeit, dass Nomos eine Entität der Korruption ist. Doch mit jedem Tag wächst mein Glaube, dass dem nicht so ist. Dass wir hier tatsächlich das Wunder des Omnissiah erleben. Ein Wunder von Kategorie 5 oder höher."
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, Pasqal continues,{/n} "Great machines of the Imperium, ones such as your ship, house a machine spirit so complex and wilful that it is difficult to tell them apart from Abominable Intelligence. There remains a possibility that Nomos is an entity of corruption. But with every day, I grow stronger in my faith that it is not so, that what we are witnessing is, in truth, the Omnissiah's miracle. One that is Category Five or higher."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einer Pause fährt Pasqal fort:{/n} "Große Maschinen des Imperiums, beispielsweise Euer Schiff, beherbergen einen so komplexen und willensstarken Maschinengeist, dass es schwierig ist, sie von Abscheulicher Intelligenz zu unterscheiden. Es besteht noch immer die Möglichkeit, dass Nomos eine Entität der Korruption ist. Doch mit jedem Tag wächst mein Glaube, dass dem nicht so ist. Dass wir hier tatsächlich das Wunder des Omnissiah erleben. Ein Wunder von Kategorie 5 oder höher."

languages.text: {n}Tras una pausa, Pasqal continúa,{/n} «Las grandes máquinas del Imperio, como su nave, albergan un espíritu máquina tan complejo y voluntarioso que no los diferencia mucho de una Inteligencia Abominable. Cabe la posibilidad de que Nomos sea una entidad corrupta. Pero, con cada día que pasa, estoy cada vez más seguro de que no es así, pues es posible que en realidad estemos ante un milagro del Omnissiah. Uno de categoría cinco o superior».
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, Pasqal continues,{/n} "Great machines of the Imperium, ones such as your ship, house a machine spirit so complex and wilful that it is difficult to tell them apart from Abominable Intelligence. There remains a possibility that Nomos is an entity of corruption. But with every day, I grow stronger in my faith that it is not so, that what we are witnessing is, in truth, the Omnissiah's miracle. One that is Category Five or higher."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras una pausa, Pasqal continúa,{/n} «Las grandes máquinas del Imperio, como su nave, albergan un espíritu máquina tan complejo y voluntarioso que no los diferencia mucho de una Inteligencia Abominable. Cabe la posibilidad de que Nomos sea una entidad corrupta. Pero, con cada día que pasa, estoy cada vez más seguro de que no es así, pues es posible que en realidad estemos ante un milagro del Omnissiah. Uno de categoría cinco o superior».

languages.text: {n}少し話をやめると、パスカルは続けた。{/n}「あなたの船のような帝国の偉大な機械には、複雑で意志的な機械精霊が宿っているため忌まわしき知能と見分けるのは難しい。ノモスが腐敗した存在である可能性は残っている。しかし、日を追うごとにそうではないという確信が増している。私たちが目撃しているのは、まさに万機神の奇跡なのだ。それも、カテゴリー5以上のものだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, Pasqal continues,{/n} "Great machines of the Imperium, ones such as your ship, house a machine spirit so complex and wilful that it is difficult to tell them apart from Abominable Intelligence. There remains a possibility that Nomos is an entity of corruption. But with every day, I grow stronger in my faith that it is not so, that what we are witnessing is, in truth, the Omnissiah's miracle. One that is Category Five or higher."

traits.locale_text: {n}少し話をやめると、パスカルは続けた。{/n}「あなたの船のような帝国の偉大な機械には、複雑で意志的な機械精霊が宿っているため忌まわしき知能と見分けるのは難しい。ノモスが腐敗した存在である可能性は残っている。しかし、日を追うごとにそうではないという確信が増している。私たちが目撃しているのは、まさに万機神の奇跡なのだ。それも、カテゴリー5以上のものだろう」

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, bir süre duraksadıktan sonra devam ediyor.{/n} "İmparatorluk'un geminiz gibi büyük makineleri, öyle karmaşık ve direngen bir makine ruhuna ev sahipliği yapar ki onları Yezit Zekâ'dan ayırt etmek güç olabilir. Nomos'un yozlaşma eseri bir varlık olma ihtimali mevcut. Lakin her geçen gün bu ihtimal azalıyor, tanıklık ettiğimiz her şeyin aslında Hermesih'in mucizesi olduğuna inancım daha da güçleniyor. En az Beşinci Kategori bir mucize..."
languages.original_text: {n}After a pause, Pasqal continues,{/n} "Great machines of the Imperium, ones such as your ship, house a machine spirit so complex and wilful that it is difficult to tell them apart from Abominable Intelligence. There remains a possibility that Nomos is an entity of corruption. But with every day, I grow stronger in my faith that it is not so, that what we are witnessing is, in truth, the Omnissiah's miracle. One that is Category Five or higher."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, bir süre duraksadıktan sonra devam ediyor.{/n} "İmparatorluk'un geminiz gibi büyük makineleri o kadar karmaşık ve direngen bir makine ruhuna ev sahipliği yapar ki onları Mekruh Zekâ'dan ayırt etmek güç olabilir. Nomos'un yozlaşma eseri bir varlık olma ihtimali var elbet. Lakin her geçen gün bu ihtimal azalıyor ve tanıklık ettiğimiz her şeyin aslında Hermesih'in mucizesi olduğuna inancım daha da güçleniyor. En az Beşinci Kategori bir mucize..."
